document_data.mainbody:
ridrik Hhune was a member of the Hhune family of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Fridrik Hhune perished the , shortly before the armies of the Cult of the Absolute attacked the city of Baldurs Gate. Fridriks tombstone was commissioned to be carved by Candulhallows Tombstones in the Lower City. His freshly-carved grave marker read "Hid last connection with this realm, severed."
